power.title: Arcane Transport
power.fluff: You extend your magic to include a nearby friend as you step through an unseen, arcane corridor

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You teleport using a Swordmage power

section.name: Target:
section.text: One ally in the burst

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You teleport the target to a space adjacent to the space you teleport to.

power.title: Channeling Shield
power.fluff: You throw up a temporary shield to absorb some of the power of a foe's attack

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An attack hits you or an ally within 10 squares of you

section.name: Target:
section.text: The creature hit by the triggering attack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The target gains resist all against the triggering attack equal to 3 + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 5 + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 7 + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Arcane Aegis:
section.text: If the attacking creature was marked by your arcane aegis, the target gains a bonus to the first damage roll it makes before the end of its next turn. The bonus equals 1 + one-half your Strength modifier.

power.title: Dimensional Warp
power.fluff: You reach out with arcane power, and two of your nearby allies suddenly wink out and reappear in each other's places

section.name: Target:
section.text: You and one ally in the burst, or two allies in the burst; both targets must occupy the same size space

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Each target taleports into the other's space.

power.title: Eldritch Spees
power.fluff: Eldritch power flows in your blood, and when battle is joined, that power speeds you on

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: You would roll initiative

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You gain a +5 power bonus to the triggering initiative roll.
During the first round of combat (or during the surprise round, if you are allowed to act during that round), you can take an extra move action.

power.title: Elemental Aegis
power.fluff: You raise an aegis in your ally's defense, infusing the shield with energy that helps defend against certain elemental attacks

section.name: Trigger:
section.text: An ally within 10 squares of you is attacked by an enemy marked by you

section.name: Target:
section.text: The triggering ally

section.name: Effect:
section.text: Choose one of: acid, cold, fire, lightning, or thunder.
The target gainst resist against the chose damage type equal to 2 + your Constitution modifier until the end of the attacking creature's next turn.

section.name: Level 11:
section.text: Equal to 4 + your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Level 21:
section.text: Equal to 6 + your Constition modifier.
